alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 11:53PM EDT until July 21 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southeastern Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 100 AM EDT. * At 1152 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of New Albany to near Hummels Wharf, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains and Carbondale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
